content: **knitted shawl in drops babymerino the piece is worked sideways in moss stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-109 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured down the middle = approx 21 cm width measured along top = approx 117 cm **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100 g colour 22 light grey **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 40 row in height with moss stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
